title: Kendall Jenner strips down to her lingerie and gets VERY cosy with ex-beau A$AP Rocky
text:
They were romantically linked in 2017 but never confirmed their relationship status.

And Kendall Jenner sparked speculation she is more than friends with her ex-beau A$AP Rocky as they got very cosy during the new Calvin Klein advert.

The model, 23, showcased her sensational physique as she stripped down to a set of matching Calvin Klein underwear for the 50th anniversary promotion.

Back on? Kendall Jenner sparked speculation she is more than friends with her ex-beau A$AP Rocky as they got very cosy during the new Calvin Klein advert

During the ad, which also stars newlyweds Justin and Hailey Bieber, Kendall lounged on a plush 70s-inspired camel seat while typing away on her mobile phone.

She posed up a storm for her flip-phone camera as she took a selfie, which was later revealed when she left her mobile lying face-up on the seat.

Kendall later transformed into a pair of co-ords by the brand, as she sat in the back of a car and cuddled up close to her former love.

Cute: Kendall later transformed into a pair of co-ords by the brand, as she sat in the back of a car and cuddled up close to her former love

Wow! The model, 23, showcased her sensational physique as she stripped down to a set of matching Calvin Klein underwear for the 50th anniversary promotion

Kendall rested her head on A$AP Rocky's - real name Rakim Mayers - shoulder as he lifted her leg into the air and played it like an air guitar.

Moments later she leaned over and whispered in his ear, before heading to a diner together with another blonde pal.

Elsewhere in the video, Justin and Hailey were busy having a steamy snogging session during a photo shoot, where she jumped up and wrapped her legs around his waist.

Let me whisper in you're ear: Moments later she leaned over and whispered in his ear, before heading to a diner together with another blonde pal

Hanging out: Kendall appeared to be in high spirits as she hung out with her former beau during the advert

Kendall and ASAP Rocky were last linked in August earlier this year, when he was spotted attending Kanye's Sunday service after being released from Swedish jail.

The former couple dated on and off beginning in 2016, with rumors of a hookup after they attended one of Jenner's events in February, according to Us Weekly.

They were also photographed together on a number of other occasions over the next year or so, which included sister Kylie Jenners 19th birthday in 2016.

Sultry: During the ad, which also stars newlyweds Justin and Hailey Bieber, Kendall lounged on a plush 70s-inspired camel seat while typing away on her mobile phone

Natural beauty: Kendall opted for a typically fresh-faced look with minimal make-up and naturally styled locks

Hey it's me! She posed up a storm for her flip-phone camera as she took a selfie, which was later revealed when she left her mobile lying face-up on the seat

But eventually they called it quits on their relationship by the end of the summer the following year.

A$AP was arrested July 2 in Stockholm after an alleged street altercation involving a 19-year-old man named Mustafa Jafari and a friend.

A number of high-profile celebrities posted messages of support on social media that included Justin Bieber and Shawn Mendes.

Cheese! ASAP Rocky flashed a toothy grin as he posed in his Calvin Klein garments

Work out: While Kendall took sexy selfies the rapper enjoyed a work out session

But it was Kanye West who had an integral part in helping persuade President Donald Trump to jump in and push for A$AP's release.

He was eventually set free on Friday, pending the judges ruling in the case, which is set for August 14.

NBC reported that the US government warned Sweden of 'negative consequence' to the relationship between the two countries if the case wasn't resolved as soon as possible.
description: The model, 23, showcased her sensational physique as she stripped down to a set of matching Calvin Klein underwear for the 50th anniversary promotion.
